name: Trapped (itch) (thenerdpoint60, Devapriyan, recker4244, unniisme, Anirudhm)
description:
Trapped is a psychological survival 2D game where you are supposed to perform tasks in-order to survive. You cannot leave house.
Make sure the dishes are done and eat well, watching television but don't forget to read a book once a while. Workout in gym and not just in your storage room while re-supplying your inventory.

Controls :

W - To use the elevator to go up

S - To use the elevator to go up

A,D - To move the player

E - For interacting with tasks
